nodes.text: Darth Momin's destruction of a city
During his time as a Sith Lord, Darth Momin was guided by the dark side of the Force to select and destroy a city.
The destruction of the city first appeared in the 2018 canon comic Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith 22 in a flashback. The comic was written by Charles Soule and illustrated by Giuseppe Camuncoli.
